title: Bound
description: Ursine Edwards was a normal, well-adjusted teenager prior to summer vacation. Now he has unintentionally married a Demon, fallen into line with a wolf-pack, and is being hunted by witches as well as the government, who are all in turn trying to use Ursine for their own devices.Can Ursine battle the darkness that is trying to consume him as well as keeping his humanity?
author: Lee  Taylor
